effect.sun_moon: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 10% chance to raise all of the user’s stats one stage.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 10% chance to raise all of the user’s stats one stage.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 10% chance to raise all of the user’s stats one stage.

short_effect.sun_moon: Has a 10% chance to raise all of the user’s stats by one stage.
short_effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Has a 10% chance to raise all of the user’s stats by one stage.
short_effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Has a 10% chance to raise all of the user’s stats by one stage.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The target is attacked with powdery scales blown by the wind. This may also raise all the user’s stats.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The target is attacked with powdery scales blown by the wind. This may also raise all the user’s stats.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The target is attacked with powdery scales blown by the wind. This may also raise all the user’s stats.
